content:
* Do not share any scripts or content that could result in liability.
* Political discussions are not allowed in the server.
* Post your query in the appropriate channel to maintain clarity and organization.
* Self-promotion or advertising of products or services is prohibited.
* Be respectful and polite in your communication, even when giving criticism or feedback.
* Do not spam or harass other members of the server.
* Before reporting an issue, search to see if it has already been discussed or addressed.
* All users should be treated equally, without talking down to or belittling anyone.
* Any questions, bugs, or issues should be posted directly in the respective channels, rather than sending DMs to any team member.
* Discord admins are available to answer any questions or clarify any unclear guidelines.
